nodes.text: Kajidii, or lorda, was a title referring to the leader of a Hutt kajidic. Two notable Kajidii were Jabba Desilijic Tiure of Desilijic kajidic and Durga Besadii Tai of Besadii.
Hutts who were the Kajidiis of clans that could trace back their legacy to Varl would represent their clan on the Hutt Grand Council and the Five Hutt Families, the Desilijic clan was one of these.
